text: Michael "Mike" Bibby (born May 13, 1978 in Cherry Hill, New Jersey) is a retired American basketball player who played with the Sacramento Kings of the NBA for most of his career. He attended college at University of Arizona where he played basketball with the Wildcats. Mike Bibby started his NBA career when he was drafted by the Vancouver Grizzlies in the 1998 NBA Draft with the 2nd pick in the 1st round. Bibby played 3 seasons with the Vancouver Grizzlies, 7 seasons with the Sacramento Kings, 3 seasons with the Atlanta Hawks and two games with the Washington Wizards before having his contract bought out by the Wizards on February 28, 2011. ==References== == Other websites == *Mike Bibby's Official website *Mike Bibby's NBA player profile Category:1978 births Category:Living people Category:American basketball players Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Basketball coaches Category:College basketball coaches Category:Miami Heat players Category:New York Knicks players Category:Point guards Category:Sacramento Kings players Category:Sportspeople from New Jersey Category:Vancouver Grizzlies players Category:Washington Wizards players
title: Mike Bibby
